Package tarea1

Interface Entity

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Attacker
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAttackable, AbstractAttacker, AbstractUnit, ArcherUnit, Barracks, Castle, CavalryUnit, InfantryUnit, Monk, SiegeUnit, Villager
    public interface Entity
    Interface for Entitys.
    An Entinty is a object that can be attacked by Attackers Objects
    Author:
    Jose Astorga

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getHp

        double getHp()
        method to obtain the actual HitPoints/hp (a.k.a. Life Points or Health Points) of the object.
        Returns:
        HitPoints of the object

      • getMaxHp

        double getMaxHp()
        method to obtain the maximum amount of hp that the object can have.
        Returns:
        double Max HitPoint of the object

      • receiveDamage

        void receiveDamage​(double damage)
        method to deal damage to the object. Deal damage consist in a reduction of hp.
        Parameters:
        damage - Damage delivered to the object

      • heal

        void heal​(double health)
        method to deal with a healing action. healing consist in an increase of hp. A healing can be received only if the object is alive.
        Parameters:
        health - Health delivered to the object

      • isAlive

        boolean isAlive()
        method to check if the entity is live. The object is alive if his hp is a positive non zero (hp>0) .
        Returns:
        Boolean indicating if the entity isAlive ( True if is alive, False otherwise)

      • attackedByArcher

        void attackedByArcher​(ArcherUnit archer)
        method to deal with an attack from an ArcherUnit object.
        Parameters:
        archer - ArcherUnit attacking the object

      • attackedByCavalry

        void attackedByCavalry​(CavalryUnit cavalry)
        method to deal with an attack from a CavalryUnit
        Parameters:
        cavalry - CavalryUnit attacking the object

      • attackedByCastle

        void attackedByCastle​(Castle castle)
        method to deal with an attack from a Castle Building
        Parameters:
        castle - Castle attacking the object

      • attackedByInfantry

      • attackedByVillager

        Parameters:
